statements: UPDATE transaction_history SET amount = 100.50, description = 'Payment for services' WHERE transaction_id = 1;
UPDATE transaction_history SET description = 'Refund for overcharge', amount = 50.75 WHERE transaction_id = 2;
UPDATE transaction_history SET amount = 100.50, description = 'Payment for services' WHERE transaction_id = 123456;
UPDATE transaction_history SET description = 'Refund for overcharge', amount = 50.25 WHERE transaction_id = 987654;
UPDATE transaction_history SET amount = 100.50 WHERE transaction_id = 10;
UPDATE reports SET report_type = 'monthly' SET report_data = '{"data": "example"}' WHERE report_id = 5;
UPDATE transaction_history SET amount = 1500.75, transaction_type = 'Deposit' WHERE user_id = 123 AND transaction_id = 456;
UPDATE reports SET report_data = JSON_OBJECT('total_reports', 50, 'user_reports', 30) WHERE report_type = 'Quarterly' AND report_id = 789;
UPDATE transaction_history SET amount = 100.50 WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE user_info SET email = 'newemail@example.com', username = 'newusername' WHERE user_id = 98765;
UPDATE transaction_history SET amount = 500, status = 'Completed' WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE user_info SET email = 'newemail@example.com', username = 'new_username' WHERE user_id = 98765;
UPDATE TransactionHistory SET amount = 100.50, timestamp = '2022-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE UserAccounts SET email = 'newemail@example.com', username = 'new_username' WHERE user_id = 98765;
UPDATE TransactionHistory SET amount = 500.75, timestamp = '2022-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE transaction_id = 100;
UPDATE UserAccounts SET email = 'newemail@example.com', registration_date = '2022-02-28' WHERE user_id = 50;
UPDATE transaction_history SET amount = 1500.50 WHERE transaction_date = '2022-08-15' AND customer_id = 1001;
UPDATE customers SET email = 'newemail@example.com', phone_number = '+1234567890' WHERE customer_id = 2002;
UPDATE transaction_history SET amount = 5000.75, transaction_date = '2022-08-15' WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
UPDATE customers SET email = 'updated_email@example.com', phone_number = '+1234567890' WHERE customer_id = 2002;
